sense.def:
A matter
so okoliščine, s katerimi se moramo spopasti.

seg.quote: It was a purely personal matter.
She's very honest in money matters.
This is a matter for the police.

sense.def:
Izraz
matters
uporabljamo tudi za okoliščine, o katerih govorimo.

seg.quote: The absence of electricity made matters worse.
An atom is the smallest indivisible particle of matter.
The termites feed on vegetable matter.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
matters to someone
, je za tisto osebo pomembno.

seg.quote: My family were all that mattered to me.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
doesn't matter
, ni pomembno, ker ne vpliva na razmere.

seg.quote: It does not matter which method you choose.

sense.def:
Kadar mislimo, da ima nekdo težave in bi radi izvedeli, kakšne, vprašamo
what's the matter?
ali
is anything the matter?

seg.quote: What's the matter, Cynthia? You sound odd.
What's the matter with your hand?

sense.def:
No matter
uporabljamo v izrazih kot
no matter how
in
no matter what
, da bi poudarili, da je nekaj res ali da se dogaja v vsakršnih okoliščinah.

seg.quote: I told him to report to me after the job was completed, no matter how late it was.
They smiled continuously, no matter what was said.

sense.def:
Če nekaj naredimo
as a matter of principle or policy
, tisto naredimo prav zaradi določenega načela ali strategije.

seg.quote: Merchant banks recruit women as a matter of policy.

sense.def:
Matter
se uporablja v izrazih kot
a matter of days
, kadar hočemo poudariti, da gre za kratko obdobje.

seg.quote: Within a matter of weeks she was crossing the Atlantic.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je nekaj
just a matter of time
, to pomeni, da se bo zanesljivo zgodilo.

seg.quote: It appeared to be only a matter of time before they were caught.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je nekaj
just a matter of doing something
, to pomeni, da je preprosto in da za njegovo izvedbo zadošča tisto drugo.

seg.quote: Skating's just a matter of practice.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
for that matter
poudarimo, da tisto, kar smo rekli o eni stvari, velja tudi za drugo.

cit.quote: navsezadnje, če smo že pri tem

seg.quote: He's shaking with the cold. So am I, for that matter.
